1.0.name: wordpress/diy-tarot
1.0.description: A complete tarot reading providing random draws (inverted as well as upright) of the 78 card Rider Waite Tarot Deck. The widget includes a push button shuffle function. After shuffling, the user pushes a button to deal the deck. Small, full color thumbs of tarot cards are drawn from the shuffled deck to reveal large, full color cards when clicked. The full color cards are then loaded, with an extensive, scrollable description of its meaning as well. The reading includes the question/situation that is relevant to the querent as well as the required action and outcome. For entertainment purposes only.
